name: Caldwell - Lost and Found - 22 Minutes to Midnight Habano de Oro - Robusto
brand: Caldwell, Lost and Found, 22 Minutes to Midnight Habano de Oro
additionalNotes: aldwell Lost & Found 22 Minutes to Midnight Connecticut Robusto Cigars are the latest addition to Robert Caldwell’s immensely popular Lost & Found series. The cigars are expertly rolled in a popular 5 x 50 size in the Dominican Republic using a beautiful golden brown Connecticut wrapper over a manufacturers secret blend of binder and long filler tobaccos. The end result is a solid medium bodied smoke with rich, captivating flavors of leather, roasted nuts, cedar, and cream.
